description: Our sexy android Pinky, is a super spy robot which processes data a hundred times faster then any human capability, as has much more intellect. As she was being shipped by the Japanese military, she was accidentally activated without a normal operating circuit. She was unaware of what happened, until she met a man named Kenichi. In a unique way, Kenichi reprograms her to operate in sex mode. She is now his sex slave. Meanwhile, the organization which created her desperately searches for their national treasure.
title: Super Sexy Android
